tips.title: High Altitude Muffin Baking
tips.tip: For high altitude baking, increase oven temperature from 400°F to 425°F for muffins.

tips.title: High Altitude Dumplings
tips.tip: For high altitude, no adjustments needed for dumplings.

tips.title: High Altitude Drop Biscuits
tips.tip: For high altitude, heat oven to 475°F (instead of 450°F). If using water, increase baking mix to 2 1/2 cups.

tips.title: Microwave Reheat Frozen Biscuits
tips.tip: Arrange frozen biscuits on paper towel on microwavable plate. Cover with paper towel and microwave on medium (50%): 2 biscuits 1-1.5 min, 4 biscuits 1.5-2 min, 6 biscuits 2-2.5 min.

tips.title: High Altitude Pumpkin Pie (3,500-6,000 ft)
tips.tip: For deep-dish pumpkin pie at high altitude, extend second bake time to 55-65 minutes. For shallow pies, no change needed.
